title: Add a favicon
body:
Firefox shows a 404 when it attempts to fetch a favicon for the site. IIRC @designakt made a SHIELD logo that we could use.

Alternatively, a blank image like what http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1321878/how-to-prevent-favicon-ico-requests recommends would be fine too. The 404 is mildly confusing because it looks like an error, so we might as well make it go away _somehow_.
